MM2.metadata: AWI Alfred Wegener Institute for Polar and Marine Research

Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature > HIDDEN
Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Dew Point Temperature > HIDDEN
Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Potential Temperature > HIDDEN
Atmosphere > Atmospheric Water Vapor > Humidity > HIDDEN
Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Flight Level Winds > HIDDEN

Data of drop sondes released from an aircraft during cold-air outbreaks over the Fram Strait (4 March 1993). The 7 profiles of temperature, humidity and wind are available as a function of distance to the pack ice edge. Details can be found in Luepkes and Schluenzen 1996, Boundary-Layer Meteorology, 79,107-130
